text: You declare that you have both provided and received the information necessary for the presentation of this application, and that you have read the Statute, of which you share the ideal aims and purposes.
You undertake to observe the obligations contained in the Statute and the resolutions of the Board of Directors and the Assembly
You declare that you have not received any convictions for crimes to be considered incompatible with the values and purposes of the Association
You undertake to periodically consult the social bulletin board and the space reserved for notices to members on the Association's website to be informed about institutional activities
You undertake to report to the Board of Directors any news of facts that are in contrast with the law or the Statute
Ask to become a member of the Association as an ordinary member
